artist: Author: Puma Perl; Publisher: Erbacce-press, Liverpool, U.K.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photographic image of female figure against garage door, with text and designs, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 36 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink pen: 12/12/12 / To fly- / Honored to be a peop! / XOX / Puma Perl
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Ruby True
